items.title: Feedback essentials

visible_instructors.name: Inga
visible_instructors.title: Inga Sodeikienė
visible_instructors.job_title: People Developer | Process tailor | Customer Advocate

items.headline: Theory, practice and tools for effective and professional feedback sessions
objectives_summary: The training is structured so that you are fully equiped for providing professional feedback. During the training I will share with you the structure of the feedback, examples, including the ones from my personal experience also we will discuss any possible drawbacks and review different points of view for providing feedback. Moreover, we will focus on how to maintain persons self worth so that your feedback session is not only effective, but also excess the growth of the person you provide the feedback to. Since feedback is a two way communication, we will also discuss on how to accept the feedback and thus grow ourselves. I have constructed a training so that you feel fully equiped for your professional feedback sessions.
